content: {"name": "Sterling UMC", "alternate_name": "", "description": "On the 2nd Saturday of every month we provide food and clothing for those in need in our community.  Doors open at 7:00 AM. Distribution runs from 8:00 \u2013 10:00 AM. \nSERVING Sterling and surrounding Northern Virginia communities", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sterlingumc.org/serve/serve-serve-the-community/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "304 East Church Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Sterling", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "20164", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.0079171, "longitude": -77.3927752}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 430-6455", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
